biotools.summary:
The Database for Elucidating the Relationships Between Natural Products, Compounds, Molecular Mechanisms, and Cancer Types. 
ACNPD is an online tool that provides users with a quick search of the pharmacological mechanisms of natural anti-cancer products. The database contains 10 common cancer types, XXX compounds, XXX pharmacological mechanisms, involving PI3K/Akt, PI3K/Akt/mTOR, Wnt/ β-catenin and other signaling pathways. The web interface allows users to query related queries in a variety of ways.
